metadata.title: CVE-2024-8179 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions from17.3 before 17.4.6, 17.5 before 17.5.4, and 17.6 before 17.6.2. Improperoutput encoding could lead to XSS if CSP is not enabled.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
